snippet: Law enforcement officials investigating the fatal shootings of two prosecutors remain no closer to linking the shootings to any particular suspects or motive.
abstract: Texas law enforcement officials investigating fatal shootings of Kaufman County prosecutors Mike McLelland and Mark E Hasse say they have found no evidence linking murders to prison gang known as Aryan Brotherhood of Texas, and that inquiry has expanded to follow several other leads.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and SERGE F. KOVALESKI

lead_paragraph: Law enforcement officials investigating the fatal shootings of two prosecutors remain no closer to linking the shootings to any particular suspects or motive.

headline.seo: Inquiry Into Deaths of Two Texas Prosecutors Is Broad
headline.main: Officials Say Texas Inquiry Is Not Limited to White-Supremacist Gang
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Inquiry Into Deaths of Two Texas Prosecutors Is Not Limited to Gang
